# Tutorials

This repository includes all the code necessary to follow [tutorials](https://storyblok.com/tutorials) created by Storyblok's documentation and developer relations teams. It serves as a central hub for learning materials, integration examples, and step-by-step tutorials to help developers explore and build with Storyblok.

[![Try Storyblok free](https://img.shields.io/badge/Try%20Storyblok-dad4ff.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=ffffff)](https://app.storyblok.com/#/signup?utm_source=docs)
[![Join the Storyblok Discord community](https://img.shields.io/discord/700316478792138842?style=for-the-badge&logo=discord&label=Join%20our%20community&labelColor=ffffff&color=dad4ff)](https://storyblok.com/join-discord)

## Get started

The projects are organized by language and platform.
Each tutorial includes its own `README` file with setup instructions, links, and relevant information.

You can clone any tutorial and use it as a standalone project.

> [!TIP]
> **No Storyblok account yet? [Sign up now](https://www.storyblok.com?utm_source=github.com&utm_medium=readme&utm_campaign=tutorials) to experience a 14-day free trial of all features.**

## Tutorial list

- [Integrate Algolia Search into Storyblok with Astro](javascript/astro/algolia-search)
- [Build a Blog with Next.js and Storyblok](javascript/next/nextjs-blog)
- [Deploy Storyblok and Nuxt Site on Netlify](hosting/netlify/nuxt-netlify)
- [Build a GEO-ready website with Storyblok and Astro](javascript/astro/GEO)
